Package com.rad.world

Class GameWorld

java.lang.Object
com.rad.world.GameWorld
public class GameWorld
extends java.lang.Object
Represents the world of the game during game play. Holds the entire list of entities in the game world.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    GameWorld​(Game g)
    The constructor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    Creates a new enemy to be spawned in the given x and y position.

    Returns the list of all players that existed in the world, including currently dead players.

    Returns the list of blocks in the game world
    Player getCurPlayer()
    Returns the user controlled player

    Returns the list of enemies in the game world

    Returns the list of entities in the game world

  • Constructor Details

    • GameWorld

      public GameWorld​(Game g)
      The constructor.
      Parameters:
      g - the main game the game world was created from.

  • Method Details

    • tick

      public void tick()
      Updates the game world state. Called Const.FRAMES_PER_SECOND frames per second. Adds all entities in queue to be added to the world, calls the tick() method for each entity in the world, removes all entities in queue to be removed from the world.

    • getAllPlayers

      public java.util.LinkedList<Player> getAllPlayers()
      Returns the list of all players that existed in the world, including currently dead players.
      Returns:
      the list of all players that existed in the world, including currently dead players.

    • render

      public void render​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Draws the game world to the screen. Called as often as possible. Draws the background and the entities to the screen.
      Parameters:
      g - the graphics the images are drawn on.

    • addEntity

      public void addEntity​(Entity e)
      Adds the given entity to the game world.
      Parameters:
      e - the entity to be added

    • createEnemy

      public void createEnemy​(int x, int y)
      Creates a new enemy to be spawned in the given x and y position.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate the enemy will be spawned
      y - the y coordinate the enemy will be spawned

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the game world. Clears all lists of entities and loads a new map.

    • getKeyInput

      public KeyInput getKeyInput()
      Returns the key input handler

      the key input handler
